attributes.action: Sack the Ambassador to the United States on the grounds of misconduct.
attributes.background: In a normal workplace if an employee brings his employer in to disrepute it is classed as gross misconduct and normally results in termination of contract. By making the comments about President Trump, the ambassador has brought the entire country into disrepute with the United States.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that call for people to be given or to lose a job.
